00027         // Collect forces from underlying models
00028         geometry_msgs::Vector3 Dynamics::getForce()
00029         {
00030                 geometry_msgs::Vector3 tempVect;
00031                 tempVect = propulsion->getForce();
00032                 tempVect = groundReaction->getForce() + tempVect;
00033                 tempVect = gravity->getForce() + tempVect;
00034                 tempVect = aerodynamics->getForce() + tempVect;
00035 
00036                 return tempVect;
00037         }
